document.full_text: the cleveland indians crushed kansas city 19-1 on monday and battered vin mazzaro into the record books for pitching the worst ever game for the royals.
document.title: indians beat royals 19-1, pitcher sets team mark
lines_and_colors: the cleveland indians crushed kansas city 19-1 on monday and battered vin mazzaro into the record books for pitching the worst ever game for the royals.
